subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It is not so much the N.F.L. draft we fear but the creeping N.F.L. draft analysis, something like an evil undertow we suspect is powered by something lurking in Mel Kiper Jr.’s hair.
snippet: It is not so much the N.F.L. draft we fear but the creeping N.F.L. draft analysis, something like an evil undertow we suspect is powered by something lurking in Mel Kiper Jr.’s hair.
